object.content:
Believing

The world contains many religions, and most theologians and religious scholars believe that all religions lead to God. Religion gives our lives
meaning and makes us accountable to a higher power. Our different
belief systems, rituals, and customs bring order to our lives and help us to explain the natural world. But regardless of our different beliefs, and the details and the nuances associated with the beauty within each of the world’s many religions, we must consider the possibility that we may all be climbing different paths to the top of the same mountain.


“Mountains inspire awe in any human person who has a soul. They remind us of our frailty, our unimportance, of the briefness of our span upon this earth. They touch the heavens, and sail serenely at an altitude beyond even the imaginings of a mere mortal.”
